Name: Coptic textile
Description: Decorative tapestry band of various colours, made at the same time as the cloth of which it forms a part. It shows two highly stylized floral motifs inside medallions, one circular and the other polylobate. Encircling the medallions is a symmetrically arranged undulating design of fleurs-de-lis and trilobates. The decoration is completed with half  medallions, polylobate in shape, containing plant motifs. The whole decoration stands out against a red ground.
